thumb.title: [Desolate] feat. Otomachi Una
thumb.description: 音街ウナ9周年記念のために作った曲です。Music & Lyrics: Arashi BurritoPIllustration: あすぱらなすVocal: Otomachi Una Ai [downer][Desolate]Awake, but asleep; I am blank insideA cold shower pours; I just want to feel aliveLately, how come my dreams are more vivid than my reality? Disconnected, but still here; it's like a robot's lifeA cold shower falls; I just want to be revivedLately, how come my dreams are more vivid than my reality? It seems when I'm not in love with you,I'm just...It seems I feel nothing without you,mindless, mindlessLately, how come my dreams are more vivid than my reality? It seems when I'm not in love with you,I'm just...It seems I feel nothing without you,mindless, mindlessGiddy only when I'm in love with you?Maybe...Can't be anything at all without you,mindless, mindlessDesolate (The soul ate?)
